str2: A little child. Diminutive of teknon; an infant, i.e. darlings.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Probably from phule through the idea of isolation; to watch, i.e. Be on guard; by implication, to preserve, obey, avoid.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Plural

str2: From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
An idol, false god. From eidos; an image; by implication, a heathen god, or the worship of such.
